content:
pasted image
Seeking views on this color for the new topic button panel
I am for this. I like it.
Change the outline to match the text color

pasted image
Something Like this?
This looks better to me as well.

I like how the buttons look on their own, but I think we don't want these buttons to grab too much visual attention. Most users will be reading most of the time, and even most replies will come from replying to a message, rather than starting a new topic/pm. I think the product also seems to be converging on non-colored buttons as the "default" button color.
If you're looking to improve the visual design of some stuff, there are several places that could use a lot of work. Let me know if that would be of interest and we can coordinate with Brock and others to make sure we don't duplicate work.
